title: Add PWA service worker for offline support
description:
Add service worker and PWA manifest:

1. Create public/manifest.json:
   - name, short_name, icons
   - theme_color: #1e1e2e (Catppuccin base)
   - background_color: #1e1e2e
   - display: standalone

2. Create src/sw.ts service worker:
   - Cache static assets (JS, CSS, icons)
   - Network-first strategy for API calls
   - Offline fallback page
   - Update prompt when new version available

3. Register service worker in main.ts

4. Add to index.html:
   - manifest link
   - theme-color meta tag
   - apple-touch-icon links

Test: Load board, go offline, verify cached assets load, API shows offline state
acceptance_criteria: PWA installable, static assets cached, offline mode shows cached UI with offline indicator
